results.title: Anti-oxidant impact of Lisinopril and Enalapril against acute kidney injury induced by doxorubicin in male Wistar rats: involvement of kidney injury molecule-1
results.text_hl: Anti-oxidant impact of @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@Lisinopril@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Enalapril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004656 @@@Enalapril@@@ against @<m>DISEASE_Acute_Kidney_Injury</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D058186 @@@acute kidney injury@@@ induced by @CHEMICAL_Doxorubicin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004317 @@@doxorubicin@@@ in male Wistar @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@: involvement of @GENE_HAVCR1 @GENE_286934 @@@kidney injury molecule-1@@@

results.title: A Fatal Case of Lisinopril-Induced Acute Necrotizing Pancreatitis
results.text_hl: Commonly cited adverse effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ include @DISEASE_Hyperkalemia @DISEASE_MESH:D006947 @@@hyperkalemia@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Acute_Kidney_Injury</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D058186 @@@acute kidney injury@@@, and @DISEASE_Angioedema @DISEASE_MESH:D000799 @@@angioedema@@@, and while uncommon, there have been reports of @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@-induced @DISEASE_Pancreatitis_Acute_Necrotizing @DISEASE_MESH:D019283 @@@necrotizing pancreatitis@@@ in the literature.

citations.NLM: Masarweh OM, Al-Moussally F, Meruvia Garron JP, Kunadia A, Karasik O, Asmar A. A Fatal Case of Lisinopril-Induced Acute Necrotizing Pancreatitis Cureus. 2023 Jun;15(6):e40071. PMID: 37304386
citations.BibTeX: @article{37304386, title={A Fatal Case of Lisinopril-Induced Acute Necrotizing Pancreatitis}, author={Masarweh OM and Al-Moussally F and Meruvia Garron JP and Kunadia A and Karasik O and Asmar A}, journal={Cureus}, volume={15}, number={6}, pages={e40071}}

results.title: Pharmacokinetics and antihypertensive effects of lisinopril in hypertensive patients with normal and impaired renal function.
results.text_hl: A significant inverse correlation was found between the @CHEMICAL_Creatinine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D003404 @@@creatinine@@@ clearance and the AUC for @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@. These results suggest that @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ has a long-lasting action and that it is a useful antihypertensive agent for controlling BP in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with either @<m>DISEASE_Acute_Kidney_Injury</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D058186 @@@NRF@@@ or mild @DISEASE_Kidney_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D007674 @@@IRF@@@.

citations.NLM: Shionoiri H, Minamisawa K, Ueda S, Abe Y, Ebina T, Sugimoto K, Matsukawa T, Gotoh E, Ishii M. Pharmacokinetics and antihypertensive effects of lisinopril in hypertensive patients with normal and impaired renal function. J Cardiovasc Pharmacol. 1990 Oct;16(4):594-600. PMID: 1706800

results.title: Renal toxicity of lisinopril and rosuvastatin, alone and in combination, in Wistar rats.
results.text_hl: The use of @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ plus @CHEMICAL_Rosuvastatin_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068718 @@@rosuvastatin@@@ at low dose also led to worsened @<m>DISEASE_Acute_Kidney_Injury</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D058186 @@@renal function@@@ by raising urinary @GENE_CLU @GENE_24854 @@@clusterin@@@ levels (217 +- 4.6 ng/ml) when compared with the control (143 +- 3.3 ng/ml).

citations.NLM: Dodiya H, Jain M, Goswami SS. Renal toxicity of lisinopril and rosuvastatin, alone and in combination, in Wistar rats. Int J Toxicol. 2011 Oct;30(5):518-27. PMID: 21878554

results.title: Acute Kidney Injury Associated with Linagliptin
results.text_hl: We hypothesize that @<m>DISEASE_Acute_Kidney_Injury</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D058186 @@@AKI@@@ was due to @DISEASE_Glycosuria_Renal @DISEASE_MESH:D006030 @@@renal hypoperfusion@@@ from @CHEMICAL_Linagliptin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069476 @@@linagliptin@@@-induced natriuresis and intravascular volume contraction in the setting of concomitant @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ use, which is known to impair autoregulation and potentiate @DISEASE_Hypotension @DISEASE_MESH:D007022 @@@hypotension@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Acute_Kidney_Injury</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D058186 @@@AKI@@@.

citations.NLM: Nandikanti DK, Gosmanova EO, Gosmanov AR. Acute Kidney Injury Associated with Linagliptin Case Rep Endocrinol. 2016;2016():5695641. PMID: 26981294
citations.BibTeX: @article{26981294, title={Acute Kidney Injury Associated with Linagliptin}, author={Nandikanti DK and Gosmanova EO and Gosmanov AR}, journal={Case Rep Endocrinol}, volume={2016}, pages={5695641}}
